sentences.en: Against all odds ( and the Visual Basic juggernaut ), it gained a lot of fans.
sentences.cn: 由于不懈努力, 它很快赢得了一大群爱好者.

sentences.en: And it is not clear that China can rein in its own economic juggernaut.
sentences.cn: 世人将拭目以待中国是否有能力控制它盲目膨胀的经济发展.

sentences.en: Clinton lost her last major opportunity to stop the Obama juggernaut.
sentences.cn: 他的战绩几乎抵消了克林顿当天在俄亥俄州取得的胜利.

sentences.en: Juggernaut has been changed to: Your Charge ability is now usable while in combat.
sentences.cn: 战斗冲锋(武器系)那个天赋修改为: 你的冲锋技能现在在战斗中可以使用.

sentences.en: Juggernaut: Bacis weapon attack power against vehicles reduced by 25 % . Bombardment ability wasn't affected.
sentences.cn: 神像机甲: 对车辆伤害下降25%,但是炮击技能威力不变.

sentences.en: New Talent: Juggernaut : Grants the warrior the ability to Charge while in combat.
sentences.cn: 新天赋, 绞肉机: 使战士能在战斗中冲锋(按照排版,这个应该是武器天赋中的)

sentences.en: Poppy: Oh no there's a juggernaut, get down!
sentences.cn: 波比: 哦,不,那儿有个神像, 快下来!

sentences.en: The group became a sales juggernaut in the commodity options business.
sentences.cn: 这个集团成为了商品期权交易市场的销售巨头。

sentences.en: The Juggernaut Firepower at Heroic Level is something to be noted.
sentences.cn: 英雄级别神像得火力需要特别提及.

trans.tran_cn: 重型卡车，巨大的力量[物体]
